game.template.elements

Class SunProducer

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.template.elements.SunProducer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mushroom, SunFlower

    public class SunProducer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for producing sun. Flowers which produce sun such as mushroom and sunFlower extends from this class and it handles time of sun producing and saving.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SunProducer(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String timeType)

      makes a new sunFlower and sets time of adding and sets its state true.

      If sunflower's sun can be appeared, returns true.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Long> getSunFlowerSunTime()
      Returns time of appearing suns.
      void init()
      Puts all cells to the hashMaps and makes their values null for the first time that means there is not any sun that location.
      void removeSunFlower(int loc)
      Removes chosen sun flower by shovel
      int saveSun(int loc, int sunNumber)
      After clicking on the produced sun by sunFlower, increases sunNumbers and removes if from hashmaps.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Puts all cells to the hashMaps and makes their values null for the first time that means there is not any sun that location.

      • setSunFlowerState

        public void setSunFlowerState()
        Checks if sun flower can make based on game type. If it is possible, sets it location.

      • getSunFlowerState

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Boolean> getSunFlowerState()
        If sunflower's sun can be appeared, returns true.

      • getSunFlowerSunTime

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Long> getSunFlowerSunTime()
        Returns time of appearing suns.

      • saveSun

        public int saveSun(int loc,
                   int sunNumber)
        After clicking on the produced sun by sunFlower, increases sunNumbers and removes if from hashmaps.
        Parameters:
        loc - clicked location(location of sinFlower)
        sunNumber - number of chosen suns
        Returns:
        new sun number, after adding produced sun of sunFlower

      • addSunFlower

        public void addSunFlower(int loc)
        makes a new sunFlower and sets time of adding and sets its state true.
        Parameters:
        loc - as location of sunFlower

      • removeSunFlower

        public void removeSunFlower(int loc)
        Removes chosen sun flower by shovel
        Parameters:
        loc - as location of selected sunFlower
